tool_description: This an employee information of an organization
name: Employee info
title: Employee info

api_list.name: SaveEmployee
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://employee-info.p.rapidapi.com/PHP/rama/RAPI/post.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "employee-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
